website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price for an excellent golf club set from a trusted name in the world of golf.
pros: Extensive set that has a nice variety of clubs
Irons have a forgiving design that allows for better ball control
Both right- and left-handed clubs available
Two hybrid clubs are nice for novices
cons: Build quality and longevity of some of the clubs in the set is questionable

customer_reviews.title: Quality: You don’t quite get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box, the clubs looked good, seemed sturdy, I was ready to go! Took the driver to the range and was kind of shocked to see wear on the club after hitting only 100 balls, there were large dents and the titanium was tearing, I don’t think it would have lasted another 100. I’m not a pro golfer by any means, but my form isn’t bad either, not bad enough to justify the damage. Maybe this club was an anomaly, but I’m gonna see what else I can find for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KidDudeSon

customer_reviews.title: Great set up for the new golfer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my teenage son, who is just starting the game. Prior to that, he used my old set from college days. This set is perfect for the new golfer. Control, distance and forgiveness are all there. Full set of irons, hybrids and woods provide coverage for the many situations new golfers find themselves. My son has thanked me no less than 10 times since he got these. He absolutely loves them. (Just a reminder, this is a teenager...he both likes a product and is thankful for it. That is high praise.)
customer_reviews.author: Howard Carter

customer_reviews.title: Made in China  & doesn't  say Callaway on bag or clubs
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice set I wish it said Callaway on the bag and clubs but nope - no mention of Callaway on bag or clubs - it does say made in china !
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Impressed with the quality. Very nice bag with lots of pockets. Saw a similar set at Costco with less clubs, that one was $500. Played 18 last weekend no issues. Monster drives and not a single deformation on the clubs like a couple of other reviews stated. Would definitely recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Take time to care for and clean your clubs, take time on the course, relax and you will hit better
customer_reviews.text: I found the Irons to have a nice balance, they hit well on the fairway. The hybrids are also great fairway striking. The driver is light and on the swing is smooth, carries the ball a good distance. All in all I found it a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Callaway Golf Clubs under $400.
customer_reviews.text: Good set of golf clubs. The only reason I didn’t rate them a 5 star, is the set didn’t come with a 3,4, or 5 iron.
customer_reviews.author: David C Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very good item but putter was damaged!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner golfer and I found these clubs easy top use very well put together. The only reason I am not giving five stars is because the item was late and the putter has three pretty significant gouges on the ball since of the head. If callaway refunds for the putter or replaces in a timely manner I will come back and update.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Millsap

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Callaway??
customer_reviews.text: Garbage made chinese clubs, Callaway should be ashamed to even be associated with Strata.
customer_reviews.author: Semper Fi

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Desite numerous positive reviews, these clubs are garbage. I would rather go back to playing on my 25 year old Wilson strated clubs. The driver had numerous dents in it after hitting half a bucket of balls at the driving range (and I am a woman with a very easy swing). The irons aren't bad, actually but the two hybrid clubs and the 3 wood and driver are absolute trash. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: tulip

customer_reviews.title: Driver cracks easily
customer_reviews.text: I hit maybe 100 balls total with my driver and it is already cracked and unusable. I understand I am a beginner and swing may not be the best. But a driver should not break that quickly or easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Brueder

customer_reviews.title: Quality full set of clubs for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of golf clubs: 16 piece. I've gone through 5 large buckets of balls at the range with these clubs and have no complaints at all. Excellent fit and finish. I'll update the review if anything bad comes to light. All clubs have been used and are solid. I'm a 3/4 swinger since I'm a beginner but the driver is holding up fine. No dents or dings from bad hits. I get good distance on solid hits. The hybrid clubs feel and perform great as do all the irons and putter. Handles feel fine. Bag is very nice and functional. I'm 6 foot. The regular club lengths work great for me. I highly recommend these clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: I got this as my first set, its been great for the price. After a full summer of use the driver finally got a ding in it, but thats from a lot of driving range sessions, with a crappy swing. Everything else is fine. No its not callaway, its a Chinese made brand callaway owns, but thats your fault if you believed thats what you were getting for the price. Recommend for a first affordable set, especially if your on the fence about how much you will golf.
customer_reviews.author: Louis P.

customer_reviews.title: Great set for just getting back on the course.
customer_reviews.text: I played golf in my younger days before kids, and was never very good. All I had was a set of old used clubs. Now that the kids are grown and out of the house I have more time and wanted to try to play again. Having gotten rid of my old clubs, I needed a new set, and these fit the bill. My first time on the course with them, I played the best round of my life (which still is not that good!). These clubs are exactly what I needed, and I’m going to really enjoy using them.
customer_reviews.author: SCGringo

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Just got back into golf after 4-5 years away from it, this set is good value for the price and clubs are quality. Lowest iron is a 6 I’d like if there was a 4 iron.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran Loye

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t say Callaway anywhere. Made in China. Looks cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Dissatisfied. Description says Callaway, but nowhere on the bag or clubs does it say Callaway anywhere. Seemed very cheap too. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: CALLAWAY #1
customer_reviews.text: Bag and clubs light as a feather! Clubs perform magnificently as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of golf clubs.
customer_reviews.text: A good set of golf clubs. The 4 and 5 hybrids are nice for me because I have a hard time hitting long irons. The driver and 3 woods have good distance and control for me.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner club set
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great set. Only dislikes is the hybrids but I’ve never used hybrids before. Just took my 3,4,5 iron from my last set and added to the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Calloway really made them. Stands behind them too.
customer_reviews.text: These are some nice clubs. A lot of people thought that Calloway didn’t make the Stratta Clubs; well they are wrong. I dinged a shot and dented the crown. I called Calloway and they graciously sent me a 1-time exchange for the driver. I guess that settles the concern of whether or not Calloway actually made them. Buy the clubs and have a great day hitting the links.
customer_reviews.author: scott foil

customer_reviews.title: Rusty Iron Shafts and Dented Driver Head
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as my first set of clubs 6 months ago. Now there is a big dent in the driver head from a miss hit and the iron shafts are starting to rust even though I've never played in the rain. I do not recommend for lack of durability.
customer_reviews.author: Sharpie2024

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these instead of the ones from Dicks. They were cheaper. I golf a lot and got a lot of use out of them. I enjoy them alot. Good buy honestly, good quality
customer_reviews.author: Sweaty65

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great clubs
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my boyfriend. He loves them! He was using some really beat up old clubs when I got him these. He can’t stop talking about the difference they make in his golf game!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn N.

customer_reviews.title: Quality clubs
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to purchase these as I had read some reviews about the drivers denting, cracking, or just plain flying off. I am happy to report that this is not the case so far with mine. I am very happy with this set. Now the negative. What is up with that putter. ... I know everyone has their own preference but.. plain jane putter that feels like it weighs double my old one did not help my short game. I actually got my old one back from my brother and let him have the new one. Other then that !! great clubs for a solid price.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Great for starters, but quickly outgrown
customer_reviews.text: I like the amount of clubs you get for the money and the bag is very flexible with pockets, however, once you start to get better the shafts on the wood and Driver are way too flexible. Anyone with a mild athletic background will outgrow them quickly. Also, I replaced the putter immediately!!
customer_reviews.author: stevemstandup

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set!
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my high school son who wanted to learn to play golf. The only thing I would change is that I would get the other set that has more pieces. Otherwise it is sharp looking and he really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Katinahat

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs all the bang without the price for beginners or people who don’t play alot
customer_reviews.author: steve basso

customer_reviews.title: great for price.
customer_reviews.text: bought for 14 year old son to learn to golf with
customer_reviews.author: smirky

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Looked great but driver is made poorly and dented after one hit.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for someone just starting out. My husband is just getting into golfing and these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: Someone stole my husbands golf clubs just before we were going on vacation where he planned on golfing - ordered these and they shipped overnight and he loves them and a good price - has all the features he was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my father in law. He loves them. I've out grown them & moved up to higher end clubs but these are great for starting out
customer_reviews.author: David Mayger

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for beginners. Very good set of clubs to start with. The bag is great as well. Well made and plenty of pockets for golf all the golf items you need and space to put your phone, wallet and keys. I've had this set for a few months now and play a lot. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great packaged set
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners or anyone looking to get back into golf after a few years (over 10) like myself. The clubs are very forgiving. With that said they will not hit as far as the higher end blades with a tiny sweet spot. They will keep you on the fairway and out of the hazards.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Cheap...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap shafts. While playing my driver cracked. I am an intermediate golfer but would not recommend this set to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Anshu Gaind

customer_reviews.title: Nice clubs
customer_reviews.text: They have not helped my game much yet, but thats my issue. Clubs and bag are very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Good clubs
customer_reviews.text: I love these clubs, consistent and accurate. For the people leaving reviews complaining that they don’t have “Callaway” on them anywhere are just trying to find something wrong with them, they’re Strata, not Callaway. Strata is a sub-brand by Callaway, it’s their version of a cheaper, affordable set of clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this back in July and barely had a chance to use it because we have two little girls under 2. He started golf back on just last week. As he was swinging the nine iron, the head of the nine iron flew off and away. Cheap quality, if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: sharon james

customer_reviews.title: New clubs , can’t wait to use them
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used them yet but packaged well and seem good
customer_reviews.author: ljr

customer_reviews.title: Broken Driver
customer_reviews.text: Driver snapped in 2 by the 7th hole with the first use of these clubs. Still waiting to hear what will be done about replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jori P. Poland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Michigan and I purchased the Strata Golf Club set to play golf when I visit my folks in Florida. This is an excellent set to play with. It exceeded my expectations. Easy to hit the ball. I was able to order them on line and have it shipped to Florida the same day. What great service!!
customer_reviews.author: Damon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Forgiving
customer_reviews.text: Great for a beginner. Can't say a lot about them as I'm new to the sport but they seem pretty forgiving. Used a few different higher end drivers from family and the Strata is definitely better for me at this stage. Everyone that has seen the set is impressed with the quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: B. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nice And Smooth Clubs
customer_reviews.text: These golf clubs are perfect me. I really like how they feel when you hit the ball. straight outta the box and you’re ready to hit the course and the bag has lots of storage to add more. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Will need to add a fairway 5 & putter
customer_reviews.text: Great little set of clubs. Had to add a Rouge fairway 5, and Oddessy Stroke Lab putter though.
customer_reviews.author: R0CKST4R

customer_reviews.title: Pumped!!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been out with them yet, hence the 4 stars. But the quality for all clubs seem top notch. I can’t can’t can’t wait for this weekend when I get out on the course. Follow up and detailed review to come soon.
customer_reviews.author: MesicsBros

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best value for the bock!!! Clubs came in perfect shape and for someone that is starting on the sport they do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: First things first... I really like this set. The only thing I wasn’t too impressed with was the driver. Felt kinda cheap especially when compared to a higher end driver. I also really wish Callaway way Displayed on the clubs and bag.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the woods. They are no good. Do not hit well at all. Sorry I bought the set for my grandson
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A Delaney

customer_reviews.title: A value
customer_reviews.text: Most every one I speak to thinks the set of clubs is a value. It is hard to say is they have improved my game, since I am a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A Dreisen

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: If you are just starting out this set is for you. It comes with every club you need to get started as well as a decent bag.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are great, I get good distance accuracy with the driver, woods, hybrids and irons. Needless to say my game is improving a little.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clubs for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just got back in to golfing after 15 years very forgiving clubs excellent for intermediate golfers
customer_reviews.author: JEFF

customer_reviews.title: Great set !!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Very good craftmanship. Will get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lackner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Men's Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 22 year old son. He is enjoying them immensely. Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: CDMSALES12539

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these clubs for my wife to use while she is learning to play. We figured they could be a decent set of clubs for when family visits. We have been extremely satisfied with the clubs and would recommend them for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent clubs, cheap driver
customer_reviews.text: After having it for 2 months golfing about 12 rounds, I was at the driving range today and the driver dented on the bottom of the club head. Besides that a great set so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with purchase has already improved my game! I just began a couple weeks ago
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E.

customer_reviews.title: Shipped wrong item??
customer_reviews.text: Just received today...waited almost 2 weeks... And I received a woman's set.
customer_reviews.author: richard nelson

customer_reviews.title: Length of clubs
customer_reviews.text: They were shorter than I expected. The woods length are fine, but the irons not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Randal R. Goeke

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Solid set of clubs! Comes with everything a beginner needs to start learning to play.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Looked at the bag, and didn’t need to look any farther. The bag would be fine for a kid, but not an adult
customer_reviews.author: DEBAENE JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Callaway Strata Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: Received used, dirty and unwrapped in a damaged box. Hard to believe it passed QC to ship to another customer.
customer_reviews.author: Beckett

customer_reviews.title: They bend super easy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, these clubs bend like crazy just from normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Good for start
customer_reviews.text: Just starting to play and these ones are very good Quality, also in good price for all the set manufactured by Callaway .
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Camarena

customer_reviews.title: great entery leavel club
customer_reviews.text: new to golf good set of clubs very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: matthew cygan

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not I expected for knowing Calloway is good name for golf products!
customer_reviews.author: Luisito

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: haven’t used it yet but looks like a good deal. delivered in a very good shape.
customer_reviews.author: youngwook yoo

customer_reviews.title: Cracking after a couple of driving sessions.
customer_reviews.text: After hitting a couple of buckets of balls my driver is already starting to crack right under the face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great club set for beginner to intermediate golfer. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mogen

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: A great set of clubs even though made in China. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Decent set for the price. Clubs and bag do not say Callaway
customer_reviews.author: Henry M

customer_reviews.title: Callaway Men's Strata Ultimate Complete Golf Set (16-Piece)
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 19 y.o. son. Very nice quality for the price. I was impressed, and the kid likes them a lot. Fantastic value!
customer_reviews.author: Z-bear

product_meta.title: STRATA Men's Golf Packaged Sets
feature_bullets: Woods: Full titanium golf driver gives you a large sweet spot and more forgiveness to bomb it off the tee. A very forgiving 3 wood built for long, high flying shots in a more aerodynamic head shape
Hybrids: The 4 and 5 hybrids are great alternatives to long irons, so you can play with more confidence on a variety of shots
Irons/Wedges: Irons have high flight technology that delivers distance, forgiveness, and control from stainless steel
Putter: Precise face milling on the putter is designed for better accuracy and distance control to help you sink more putts
Stand Bag: Lightweight, durable bag combines a cool authentic look, convenient pockets, and an easy to carry back strap
Strata Ultimate is designed for ultimate distance and ultimate performance; This set includes: driver, 3 wood, 4 and 5 Hybrid, 6 to 9 Iron, PW and SW, Putter, Stand Bag, 4 Head covers

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
